scenes.action_text: ALL OF US STRANGERS Written by Andrew Haigh Based on the novel "Strangers" by Tai chi Yamada BLUEPRINT PICTURES INT. ADAM'S APARTMENT - DUSK 1 1 A view of London stretches south past half-built tower blocks rising above the Victorian housing stock. This is the view from inside an apartment, twenty-seven floors up.
